description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Restore color to the cosmos in this bright twist on an arcade classic! Players control an ever-growing snake that can change an object's color at will. As the snake lengthens it becomes possible to change more and more objects at once! However, a long tail can make accurate color shifts tricky and time is running out in the color-drained universe of Chrophidian!
